mapper.select: SELECT user_id, center_id, group_id, team_id, jobnumber, punchcardrecord_date, time_start, time_end, ( worktime - weekdaysovertime - TIME_TO_SEC(timediff(TIME_FORMAT(lunchbreak_end,'%H:%i'),TIME_FORMAT(lunchbreak_start,'%H:%i'))) / 60 / 60) AS worktime FROM ( SELECT user_id, center_id, group_id, team_id, jobnumber, cast( punchcardrecord_date AS date ) AS punchcardrecord_date, min( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ) AS time_start, max( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ) AS time_end, ROUND( TIMESTAMPDIFF( MINUTE, min( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ), max( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ) ) / 60, 2 ) AS worktime FROM punchcardrecord GROUP BY user_id, center_id, group_id, team_id, jobnumber, cast( punchcardrecord_date AS date ) ORDER BY cast( punchcardrecord_date AS date ) ) newpunchcardrecord LEFT JOIN attendancesetting ON STATUS = '0' WHERE STATUS = '0'
